problem.markdown:
Continuing from Part 1, the next operation after turning (lathe operation), is a milling operation. The operation time at the milling machine is 4 minutes. Its mean time to fail is 30 hours and its mean time to repair is 5 hours. Any amount of parts can be stored in between the lathe and the mill.
>>At what rate material on average will accumulate in the storage area in terms of parts per minute? (Round to 3 decimal places) <<
= 0

numericalresponse.p: Continuing from Part 1, the next operation after turning (lathe operation), is a milling operation. The operation time at the milling machine is 4 minutes. Its mean time to fail is 30 hours and its mean time to repair is 5 hours.
Any amount of parts can be stored in between the lathe and the mill.
numericalresponse.label: At what rate material on average will accumulate in the storage area in terms of parts per minute? (Round to 3 decimal places)
